word_mean: 形态渐进，生物进化：动物或植物类属在进化过程中的形态改变或向高级阶段的发展

sentence.Network_en: The change of the anamorphosis means the change of social culture status and social value.

list.abs: black English , like all other anamorphosis , is a symbol of the status and the social culture of a race .黑人英语与其他变体一样是一个民族身份的象征，是一个民族社会文化的象征。
there are two allotropes , yellow anamorphosis is stable under 90 centigrade.Stability form of antimony is metal anamorphosis .有两种同素异形体,黄色变体在负90度下稳定，金属变体是锑的稳定形式。
they express three anamorphosis from same direction , and they are also the system that I know this world .表达了同一个方向的三个变体，也是我认识世界的一个体系。
respectively among all the kinds of anamorphosis , central nervous system anamorphosis had the greatest proportion ( 58 % ) .各类畸形中以中枢神经系统畸形所占比例最高(58%)。

derivation.yuyuan_name: early 18th cent.: from Greek anamorphōsis 'transformation', from ana- 'back, again' + morphosis 'a shaping' (from morphoun 'to shape', from morphē 'shape, form')

means.word_mean: 1. the evolution of one type of organism from another by a long series of gradual changes
2. a distorted projection or perspective; especially an image distorted in such a way that it becomes visible only when viewed in a special manner
